title: Changing between Fixed off set and Pre-side off set
body: I don't know if it's just me but the Fixed off set and Pre-side off set won't change at all. I'd prefer the Pre-side off set but as I was playing a game I felt like I was on the fixed off set. When I changed between both of them it only stayed on the fixed offset so when you change it to the pre-side off set, it won't change at all.

replies.body:
Hey Sakuzo - 

We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it ASAP.
Hey Katey I know you're just keeping tabs for this issue but is this something we can expect to be hotfixed or do we need to wait until the next patch?
I was wondering the same thing... this NEEDS to be hotfixed.

Guy's she's already confirmed it wont be fixed during patch 6.2. I dont know why she doesnt mention it when she answer's new threads as it gives the latest possible answer to people but i think she's just trying to reduce damage control because people dont wanna hear its not gonna be fixed in this patch.

It's not that - in a lot of cases, I'm just trying to hit as many threads as possible to let people know we're at least aware of the issue and are working on a fix. (This also isn't part of my job, as I work on skins, so it's something I try to do when I have a chance. ^-^)
Huge respect to you Katey, im trying to tell people myself but it means alot more coming from yourself for obvious reasons.
As noted above, this won't be in patch 6.2.
This won't be resolved in 6.2, so no, this won't be hotfixed.
